name: Escape the House - Round Trip
description:
When a secret research agency discovers a ominous house in a quiet cul-de-sac, where anyone who enters is never seen again, a project was made to study it's spacious anomalies.

After many tests, noticing the house's capability of withstanding any damages from outside, the agency infers that it could stay upright for much more time than normally possible. 

In this puzzle and horror game, you, the player, control an inmate used as a subject for the next testing procedure. With a pocket watch in hands, you're given the task to travel in a round trip between the present and thousands of years in the future, while searching for an exit inside the confines of this house, with the objective to discover humanity's future, centuries from now. 

Inside the house, you will have to take a journey through abnormal rooms, solving it's puzzles, and travel between time periods, while facing unknown entities and trying to escape the labyrinthic insides of the house.

Developed for 2021's second semester's assignment from the Digital Games course of PUC-SP university.

CW: flashing lights and mildly disturbing content. Recommended for 

Controls (can be customized before and during gameplay):

  • Movement (up, down, left and right): WASD
  • Interact: E
  • Use item in inventory: Mouse0
  • Drop item from inventory: C
  • Aim flashlight: Mouse1
  • Use radio: F
  • Travel Time: Q
  • Selecting inventory slots: 1, 2, 3
  • Exit menu: Esc

Features: 

  • Approximately 40 minutes of Single Player playtime 
  • Four levels, with a final boss included!
